resources.string: UniVote is an Internet voting system for elections at Swiss universities. It is the result of ongoing research activities at the Bern University of Applied Sciences. The source code and a detailed description of the system is available on the project web page.
To register, you will need your ordinary SWITCHaai credentials. UniVote uses them to verify your affiliation to a Swiss university.

To cast a vote, you will need your personal voting key from the registration process. The key has been stored on your mobile device. The voting key allows UniVote to verify your eligibility without knowing your identity.
